title: Please fix this problem!!!
body: So while i was loading into a game my client disconnected me and so i couldnt reconnect to the game so i decided to restart my client and when i did it said i had to repair it which i did and when i got back into my game and finished it at the end i got a 5 low queue suspension, someone or rito please help me this is just stupid.

replies.body: Damn, it sounds like something with your PC or game files went haywire to require a repair after crashing.  A [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) can only be removed by playing without leaves, even if it's not intentional.  The system treats all leaves equally because all leaves cause negative experiences for others.  Let me know if you have any questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xqcArcbZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-20T18:51:13.320+0000)

The system treats all leaves equally because all leaves cause negative experiences for others.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Thanks, is it possible for you guys to like know if it was an actual afk or like a file repair?

Yeah, players intentionally leaving games can receive suspensions outside of the leaverbuster system.  The lower priority queue gives you a chance to troubleshoot or prevent any issues that would have caused you to leave a game.  Hope that helps clear things up!
